title: Clean Development Task Interface
description: Remove unnecessary UI elements including Branch link, PR created and ready for development text, and Rebase link from the Development Task interface to create a streamlined user experience focused on essential development actions.
iWant: a simplified Development Task interface without cluttered navigation elements
soThat: I can focus on core development work without visual distractions
acceptanceCriteria: Branch link is removed from Development Task interface
PR created and ready for development text is removed from the interface
Rebase link is removed from Development Task interface
Essential development task information remains visible and accessible
